document.full_text: this production of 'the illusion,' adapted by tony kushner from a work by the 17th-century french playwright pierre corneille, trafficks in a special, baroque brand of magic.
document.title: theater review | 'the illusion': fantastical adventures of a missing son
lines_and_colors: this production of 'the illusion,' adapted by tony kushner from a work by the 17th-century french playwright pierre corneille, trafficks in a special, baroque brand of magic.
